Vulnerability is a software error that can be exploited by a potential attacker to gain access to your network or system. The use of misconfigured services, weak passwords and the presence of packages that contain bugs or security holes are loopholes that can be exploited at any time. I

Zabbix Security Insights is a solution that implements Vulnerabilities Monitoring using Zabbix, UserParameter, Yum Security plugin to collect and generate a view of security environment for a better management and compliance in Red Hat Enterprise Linux servers and derived. This solution was tested in Zabbix 2.0, 2.2, 2.4 and 3.0.

Using this template you will be able to:

  • Monitor Security Advisories
  • Monitor BugFix Advisories
  • Monitor Enhancements Advisories
  • Use vulnerabilities report to check server vulnerabilities and fixes

This solution can be used to monitor physical servers, virtual machines, cloud servers and Docker containers with Red Hat Enterprise Linux system and derived distributions.
author: Alessandro Silva
